rules_text:
When New Gear enters, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
When equipped creature attacks, if you have three or more {V}, it gains first strike until end of turn.
Equip {1}
notes:
As long as you have three or more V —> Whenever equipped creature attacks, if you have three or more V
